data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mendonça, Marina Barreira, Oyakawa, Osvaldo Takeshi, Wosiacki, Wolmar Benjamin (2018): A new species of Ituglanis Costa & Bockmann, 1993 (Siluriformes: Trichomycteridae) from Rio Ribeira de Iguape and upper Rio Tietê basins, southeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 4504 (4): 473-488, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4504.4.2|2 occurrences
